New Records: Glenn Phillips scored 104 runs off 64 balls, with a strike rate of 162.50
Key Match Events: Glenn Phillips made 104 runs, the highest individual score for New Zealand in the match
Ish Sodhi took 2 wickets for 21 runs
Mitchell Santner took 2 wickets for 21 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Glenn Phillips was awarded the Player of the Match award
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka was penalised for slower over rate at the end of the 19th over
The match was played at the Sydney Cricket Ground
Others: The match was the 27th match of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022-23
